Package boolShell

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    Commons
    Contains common constants like error-messages, command-indicators and the default I/O-Streams
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BoolShell
    BoolShell Shell programm for usage with boolean formulars Supports AND, OR, NOT, variables, referencing old input and more
    CommandReaderParser
    Reads and parses the input so the commands can be executed without problems
    Commands
    Contains all commands Central interface of CommandReaderParser and Formular.
    Formular
    Abstract class for all Formulars Supports generall validation-method which creates the right Formular out of the command e.g.
    FormularBuffer
    Buffer of all saved Formular Formular can be added and removed Can print the last saved Formular which often representates the last command of client
    Recursion
    Contains all recursive methods Used by Commands Can substitute a Variable in a Formular by another Formular, simplify a Formular by using boolean rules, create a copy of a Formular
  • Exception Summary 
    Exception Description
    SyntaxException
    BoolShells Exceptions Prints error-messages with a default entering message Error-messages are declared at Commons
